meanings.definition: Used for emphasis or to express anger, annoyance, contempt, or surprise.
meanings.sent2: She was so fucking mad at him.
meanings.sent3: Fucking! I can't believe you did that!
meanings.sent4: The thunder was so loud, it sounded like a fucking explosion!
meanings.sent5: His scream was like a fucking war cry.

meanings.definition: Used to intensify a statement or expression.
meanings.sent1: She ran fucking fast to catch the bus.
meanings.sent2: I am so fucking tired after work.
meanings.sent3: He ate the cake so fucking quickly!
meanings.sent4: The music was so loud, it was fucking deafening.
meanings.sent5: The car drove by fucking swiftly.

meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to convey extreme emotion or emphasis.
meanings.sent1: I am fucking exhausted after the long hike.
meanings.sent3: She was fucking thrilled to see her favorite band live.
meanings.sent4: The storm outside was fucking fierce.
meanings.sent5: The news was so shocking, it was fucking unbelievable.
